Message:
My cannon was problematic as usual,
but the fight against the demons
was progressing in our favor.

My efforts were recognized,
and I was promoted to chief officer.

Throughout the land,
humanity was scoring
victory after victory.
The day we take back our world
from the demons is close at hand.

Suddenly, black flames
appeared all over the world.

In the blink of an eye,
the flames spread everywhere,
burning to death both
human and demon alike.

There, in the center
of the flames was...

“Why? Why are you doing this...?
Commander... Paladea!!”

The one I admired
didn’t utter a single word,
and the flames only grew stronger.

Running wild like a turbid flood,
the black flames swallowed us
and the entire world whole.

Even voices of resentment
were burned away from the land,
leaving only the resounding
sneers of demons.
